item.title: About
item.description: I’m helping connect people to funding opportunities using AI at GrantPuma. Experience grantpuma.com Dec 2023 - Present Team Lead Management Full stack Devops Machine Learning Technical writing getfliff.com May 2023 - Oct 2023 Senior Software Engineer Kafka Legacy python jockmkt.com January 2022 - May 2023 Senior Software Engineer Payments Gambling software Microservices trellis.law November 2019 - December 2021 Senior Software Engineer APIs Elasticsearch Payments Mentoring merieuxnutrisciences.com May 2017 - October 2019

item.title: Interests
item.description: I write software for work and for fun! I’m always interested in building new systems, big or small. Here is small sample of software I have recently constructed just for fun. Feel free to check it out! Big Number Names Compute the name of any number up to infinity Art For All Text your first and last name to +1 (312) 635-4223 for a unique digital artwork made specifically for you based on a proprietary algorithm.
